title: Galatta Plus Mega Pan India Roundtable 2023
overview: The Galatta Plus Mega Pan India Roundtable 2023 unites luminaries such as Rani Mukerji, Karan Johar, Taapsee Pannu, Prithvi Konanur, Jude Anthany Joseph, Rima Das, and Sandeep Reddy Vanga. Join them as they delve into discussions about their respective works and works that impressed them over the past year. They also explore the evolving dynamics of audience preferences across different industries and reflect on the diverse cinematic landscape that our country has to offer.
